Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Water Board to reestablish a six-year timeframe within which customers may challenge the fees, rates, rents and other service charges established by the New York City Water Board for water and wastewater services.
Items.MatterName: NYC Water Bd to reestablish a six-year timeframe within which customers may challenge the fees, rates, rents and other service charges.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Water Board not to set rates for water and wastewater services for each fiscal year until at least thirty days after the adoption of the City's budget for each fiscal year and to take all steps necessary to implement this change.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Water Bd not to set rates for water and wastewater services for each fiscal year until at least 30 days after the adoption of the City's budget.

Items.Title: Oversight - The impact of the New York City Department of Environmental Protection's capital budget proposals on water rates and an examination of the process by which water rates are set.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The impact of the New York City Department of Environmental Protection's capital budget proposals on water rates and an examination of the process by which water rates are set.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Finance
Oversight - The impact of the New York City Department of Environmental Protection's capital budget proposals on water rates and an examination of the process by which water rates are set.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The impact of the New York City Department of Environmental Protection's capital budget proposals on water rates and an examination of the process by which water rates are set.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Water Board not to set rates for water and wastewater services for each fiscal year until at least thirty days after the adoption of the City's budget for each fiscal year and to take all steps necessary to implement this change.
Items.ActionName: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Water Bd not to set rates for water and wastewater services for each fiscal year until at least 30 days after the adoption of the City's budget.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Water Board to reestablish a six-year timeframe within which customers may challenge the fees, rates, rents and other service charges established by the New York City Water Board for water and wastewater services.
Items.MatterName: NYC Water Bd to reestablish a six-year timeframe within which customers may challenge the fees, rates, rents and other service charges.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Weprin, Brewer, Nelson, Sears, Oddo, Comrie, Provenzano and Quinn.
